00010 using namespace std;
00011 Tower::Tower(TowerType type) {
00012         this->price = type;
00013         this->type = type;
00014         this->fired = false;
00015 
00016         switch (this->type) {
00017         case ACID:
00018                 this->areaOfEffect = 10;
00019                 this->damage = 40;
00020                 this->recoil = 30;
00021                 this->fuel = 150;
00022                 this->scope
00023                                 = static_cast<int> (pow(static_cast<double> (this->fuel), 2));
00024                 this->speed = 16;
00025                 break;
00026         case ICE:
00027                 this->areaOfEffect = 45;
00028                 this->damage = 50;
00029                 this->recoil = 30;
00030                 this->fuel = 150;
00031                 this->scope
00032                                 = static_cast<int> (pow(static_cast<double> (this->fuel), 2));
00033                 this->speed = 20;
00034                 break;
00035         case STONE:
00036                 this->areaOfEffect = 90;
00037                 this->damage = 40;
00038                 this->recoil = 40;
00039                 this->fuel = 140;
00040                 this->scope
00041                                 = static_cast<int> (pow(static_cast<double> (this->fuel), 2));
00042                 this->speed = 10;
00043                 break;
00044         case SUPERIOR:
00045                 this->areaOfEffect = 10;
00046                 this->damage = 30;
00047                 this->recoil = 10;
00048                 this->fuel = 170;
00049                 this->scope
00050                                 = static_cast<int> (pow(static_cast<double> (this->fuel), 2));
00051                 this->speed = 20;
00052                 break;
00053         default:
00054                 break;
00055         }
00056 }

00061 void Tower::clockTick() {
00062         if (this->fired) {
00063                 // tick cooldown
00064                 this->coolDown--;
00065                 if (this->coolDown <= 0) {
00066                         this->fired = false;
00067                 }
00068         }
00069 }
00070 
00071 void Tower::draw(SDL_Surface* surface, SDL_Surface* imageTower, bool circle) {
00072         SDL_Rect rect;
00073         rect.x = this->posX;
00074         rect.y = this->posY;
00075         SDL_BlitSurface(imageTower, NULL, surface, &rect);
00076 
00077         if (circle == true) {
00078                 Uint32 color = SDL_MapRGBA(surface->format, 0, 255, 255, 127);
00079                 circleColor(surface, this->posX, this->posY, this->fuel, color);
00080         }
00081 }
00082 
00083 bool Tower::fire(int x, int y) {
00084         // check range
00085         if (static_cast<int> (pow(static_cast<double> (this->posX - x), 2))
00086                         + static_cast<int> (pow(static_cast<double> (this->posY - y), 2))
00087                         <= this->scope) {
00088                 // if not fired , fire!
00089                 if (!this->fired) {
00090                         this->fired = true;
00091                         this->coolDown = this->recoil;
00092                         return true;
00093                 }
00094         }
00095         return false;
00096 }

00098 void Tower::setPos(int x, int y) {
00099         this->posX = x;
00100         this->posY = y;
00101 }
